about_the_game:
Deep Menage VR is an immersive VR shooter, focused on the satisfaction of killing in many different ways, horrific monsters.

A vast range of enemies will test your aim, courage and strategy. Those creatures left the deep ocean and quickly took over our land, killing everyone that was in front. Now it’s up to you to face these terrifying creatures!

But don’t worry, you will have an amazing arsenal of weapons to choose, upgrade and combine as you prefer. Do you like fast shooting rifles with no reloading? We got you covered, Powerful shotguns that can turn your enemies into dust? Of course we have! Or do you prefer the good old sniper rifles that can kill enemies before they take a single step towards you? You will love our options! Or do you like the special stuff, rocket launchers, plasma guns and Gatling cannon? Oh yes, we have them at your disposal!

Have fun from the first shot until you finish all the 24 missions, in different difficulty levels, so your journey will have the right amount of challenge for you!

content_descriptors.notes: You will shoot monsters, they will bleed, explode and die.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB / AMD Radeon RX 550 4GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: In this Terrifing single player shooter you will: Shoot, kill, destroy, burn, or explode horrific monsters in this immersive VR survival shooter. Buy and upgrade many incredible weapons, and use them in any combination you feel like to survive this horrendous world.
